page.title: 06A day in Sarah's life
page.content: Sarah is 5 years old,she gets up at 8 O'clock and has breakfast at 8.15.She leaves for Sutton-at-hone primary school at 8.50 and arrives as the whistle goes at 9.00.Sarah does not have a favourite lesson,she likes every thing.At playtime she plays mothers and fathers and dragons,she likes skipping, hide and seek as well as sand and water. Indoors she likes to choose lego puzzles and drawing when she has done her writing and number work. She is just starting to learn to read.At home she goes to bed at 7.00pm.
